column1: Little Goat Diner////We were at the restaurant Monday evening - October 17th.  Everything we ordered was salty.  I sent back the smoked fries
column3: the bottom half of the bowl was still salty.  We ordered the pork belly pancake
column6: brussel sprouts and biscuit and gravy.  All four of us in the party agree all were on the salty side.  My husband had the bibimbop which was ok.  My son had been here before and he agreed he had better food from last time.
